title: Seeker's Armguard Stacks
body: Rito can you make it were we can see the stacks on the armguard.

replies.body: A counter on the item and spectral wraith would be nice, kind of like mejai's.
yea that would be great, truthfully we need counters on everything.
Maybe not everything that stacks. However a nice QoL update for tear would be a highlighted background when it's fully stacked.
for me whenever I hover over, it doesn't show anything.
For the people saying it does, i believe op is asking for a feral flare style counter on the buff bar
i could have sworn it showed you how much ap and armor you have gained when you mouse over the armguard
